content.description: Start the same as you would for JOY (low and left side of scoop) but move right through the scoop to the bomber pinch and then top out straight up from the Phive6 graffiti.

This is likely going to go down as a classic climb at Purgatory Falls. Start low in the scoop. Both hands matched to a big jug, feet smeared in the bottom of the scoop. Move out of the scoop and work your way over the roof using crimps/rails. Make a big move to the top and match hands. Mantel move gains the top-out.
content.location: Classic line on the Scoop Boulder (see images)

content.description: Boulder that is river side further up the trail from the Falls Boulders. There is a cool scoop like feature from water erosion and some other cool features.  Depending upon river height it may be a wet landing. Summer seems to offer a nice sandy landing though.
